mapper.insert: INSERT INTO smbms_user (id, userCode, userName, userPassword, gender, birthday,phone, address, userRole, createdBy, creationDate, modifyBy, modifyDate) Values (#{id}, #{userCode}, #{userName}, #{userPassword}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{userRole}, #{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{modifyBy}, #{modifyDate})
